item.title: Build yt-dlp.exe
item.content:encoded:
Build yt-dlp.exe From Source on Windows (Final Guide)

1. Required Tools

Download and install the following:

Python

https://www.python.org/downloads/
Check during install: Add Python to PATH

Git for Windows

https://git-scm.com/downloads/win

Visual C++ Build Tools

https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/visual-cpp-build-tools/
Install components:

  • MSVC v143 build tools

  • Windows 10/11 SDK

  • (optional) CMake tools

FFmpeg (optional but recommended)

https://www.gyan.dev/ffmpeg/builds/
Extract to:

C:\Util\ffmpeg\

2. Environment Variables (Dev VM)

Add these to PATH:

C:\Users\Shadow\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314
C:\Users\Shadow\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\Scripts

Add this new variable:

Variable name: YTDLP_PATH
Value:

C:\Users\Shadow\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python314\Lib\site-packages\yt_dlp

3. One-Time Setup

Run in PowerShell:

python -m pip install --upgrade pip
python -m pip install yt-dlp
python -m pip install pyinstaller
python -m pip install --upgrade certifi

4. Build yt-dlp.exe

Below are instructions for PowerShell and Git Bash
(use the one that matches the shell you run!).

4A. Build Using PowerShell (recommended)

PowerShell expands environment variables as:

$env:VARIABLE_NAME

Run:

pyinstaller --onefile --name yt-dlp "$env:YTDLP_PATH\__main__.py"

4B. Build Using Git Bash

Git Bash uses:

  • $VARIABLE instead of %VARIABLE%

  • Forward slashes only

First ensure the variable exists:

echo $YTDLP_PATH

If empty, set it manually:

export YTDLP_PATH="/C/Users/Shadow/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python314/Lib/site-packages/yt_dlp"

Then build:

pyinstaller --onefile --name yt-dlp "$YTDLP_PATH/__main__.py"

5. Output of Build

After building, your EXE is located at:

dist/yt-dlp.exe

Copy it to:

C:\Util\yt-dlp\

6. Using yt-dlp on Other PCs

Set PATH:

C:\Util\yt-dlp\
C:\Util\ffmpeg\bin\

Then you can run:

yt-dlp --version

7. Updating Your Build

When yt-dlp publishes a new version:

python -m pip install --upgrade yt-dlp
pyinstaller --onefile --name yt-dlp "$env:YTDLP_PATH\__main__.py"

8. Clean the Build Output

To reset the build directory:

PowerShell:

Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build, dist, yt-dlp.spec

Git Bash:

rm -rf build dist yt-dlp.spec

9. Useful Commands

yt-dlp --version
python --version
where python
where yt-dlp

10. Shell Behavior Summary

Shell Variable Syntax Path Style
PowerShell $env:VARNAME Backslashes allowed
CMD %VARNAME% Backslashes allowed
Git Bash $VARNAME Only forward slashes

11. Optional: Build from GitHub Source

Clone repository:

git clone https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp.git
cd yt-dlp

Install dependencies:

python -m pip install -r requirements.txt

Build using internal dev script:

python devscripts\make_exe.py

Output:

build/yt-dlp.exe

Guide Complete

item.title: Fixa boot + LAN
item.content:encoded:
Vid boot också tryck E första gången och ta bort ordet

Remove "splash" i denna fil och sen kör andra commandot:

Step 1)

sudo nano /etc/default/limine
sudo limine-mkinitcpio

Step 2)

KERNEL_CMDLINE[default]+="quiet pcie_aspm=off nowatchdog rw rootflags=subvol=/@ root=UUID=36835f32-91ee-4350-ac34-cb10dbeb9539"

Step 3)

sudo limine-mkinitcpio
